title: Nabbit

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - **Nab**: Roleblock a Target, If successful, Gain a 1-use copy of the ability they were using.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may multitask.
- You may only use Abilities that can kill if you are the Factional attacker.
- You copy the role's Attack and Defense values when using the ability.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose Lord Bowser.

desc:
Post 2490
*I'm Nabbit. I'm fast. Faster than you. That's all you need to know.*
